Summary: Star like object hovers and sometimes moves with lightneing emitting from it.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe have seen this object in the area North of Kingston Ontario Canada many times. It moves very silently and I have chased it while driving and it took off to the East. See attached video. If we get more this we will be sending it to you.
